thread.title: Richard J. Gillis
thread.title_full: Inkfarm.com reviewed by Richard J. Gillis

author: Richard J. Gillis
title: Richard J. Gillis
text: I have an HP printer that the stores no longer sell the ink to so I was looking at having to buy a new printer just because I couldn't get black ink. I saw Inkfarm and they had my ink at almost half the price of what I used to pay and I ordered one cartridge and I got it in the mail in less than a week and my printer is now running fine. I would recommend them for your ink problems especially for obsolete ink cartridges.
